question: The Band-e Amir National Park is located in which country?
explanation: The Band-e Amir National Park is the Afghanistan\'s first national park, located in the Bamyan Province. It is a series of six deep blue lakes separated by natural dams made of travertine, a mineral deposit. The site of Band-e Amir has been described as Afghanistan\'s Grand Canyon, and draws thousands of tourists a year. The river is part of the system of the Balkh River.
